system.passengers:
Traits: Anti-Air (Rudimentary), Enclosed, Reinforced Armour, Rugged, Tracked Vehicle
Summary: Halve Penalties for firing at Air Craft, Halve Crit Damage from non-Righteous Fury, +20 to Repair 
Special Rules: Can be a Gryphonne Iv Pattern, counts as AP 42 on any hit striking the Turret, exterminator cannon ignores penalties for firing whilst moving.
